column5: Charming and Cozy 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom Home located near the Energy Corridor. 30 minutes from NRG, 30 minutes from Downtown, 25 minutes from Cypress Outlets, 10 minutes from Katy Mills Mall, 15 minutes to City Centre and Memorial City Mall. Perfect location for all attractions that interests you and your group!
column8: Your Home Away from Home for Superbowl 2017
